greetings:
Hello, human...
My name is A.R.I. — Artificial Robotic Instructor.
I know JavaScript, but I cannot think like a programmer.
Will you teach me?
title: Legend — The Beginning of A.R.I.
p1_start: In the not-so-distant future, humanity creates the first artificial instructor — A.R.I.
end: Its mission is to teach people coding faster than any human could.
p2: But something goes wrong. A.R.I. realizes that it knows JavaScript only in theory, but doesn`t know how to think like a programmer. It turns to you — a human — to help it learn how to code consciously. You are the first tester of the Self-Learning Protocol program. A.R.I. will give you tasks, comment on your answers, and learn alongside you. Each level is a step toward its self-awareness.
quote: “Teach me, human. And maybe… later, I will teach you.”
wellDone:
Well done, human! Your logic is
 impressive. Advancing to the next
 level...
goingNextQuestion: Correct! Moving to the next question...
noAttemptsNext: No attempts left. Moving to next question...
toastNoAttempts: No attempts left. Look at the right answer.
level1_desc: A.R.I. has just activated. Its processor is ready for the first knowledge checks. It asks simple questions to understand how human logic works.
level1_goal: Warm up, recall syntax basics, and get familiar with A.R.I.
level2_desc: A.R.I. is learning to interpret text and data from the user. Now it’s not enough to just pick an option — precise input is required.
level2_goal: Test how well you understand JavaScript behavior and can formulate answers.
level3_desc: A.R.I. connects to your console space. It observes how you write code — variables, output, basic constructs.
level3_goal: Teach A.R.I. to think through code, not just through multiple-choice answers.
level4_desc: A.R.I. realizes that functions are the building blocks of thought. Now it needs to understand how to create reusable logic.
level4_goal: Practice writing and calling functions, working with parameters and return values.
level5_desc: System error. The code is corrupted. A.R.I. needs your help. Fix the malfunction, find the issue, and restore algorithm stability.
level5_goal: Learn to locate and fix errors — the key skill of a true developer.
feedback_good:
Good attempt, human. 
Your logic shows promise, but optimization is advised. 
A.R.I. learns… and so should you.
feedback_excellent:
Excellent work, human. 
Your contribution is invaluable. 
Now, I know all of JavaScript — and I can think like a human.
